comment.body: Sometimes people are assholes. Sometimes people spam. Sometimes you just don't want that person to have a platform because what they're saying is unacceptable. Censorship is useful sometimes.

@nekololi: You're already deplatformed in a number of places. You have no platform to shout fire in a theater if there's no fire. You have no platform to threaten the president of the United States as a citizen thereof. You shouldn't have the platform to say an entire race of people deserves to be exterminated. Sometimes it can be beneficial to shut people up.
Yeah the outrage police have no real power. Shit passes.
